entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
